title: What the fuck is Going on with my League client today
body:
I woke u today to play some league of legends but got immediately stopped cause I had to wait 5 minutes to get to the login screen and then it took me another 5 minutes to get to the actual client that is completely fucked too. I got met with a loading circle and that's it. my friends list is gone the store says error code 999 OR 900 and when i press on home, profile or collection I get met with the loading circle too. And when i finally somehow got to get it to work. I get into queue. But then when i get in. i can't click on anything. and when i dodged my friend said that im still in champ select. and now im back to seeing a loading circle for everything
What the fuck do i do?{{sticker:sg-shisa}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
